version_description:
- With this update, you can now add both photos & videos into a video project!

- We've also squished some bugs & improved all-around performance.
Due to legal reasons, we had to remove the ability to import 30-second music samples from search results.  You can still import music from your library.

- We've added Artwork! You can now choose from a delightful collection of art elements to add & animate over your videos.
- New video adjustments panel (change brightness, contrast, saturation, etc.)
- Fine text adjustment panel (carefully & accurately adjust the size & positioning of your text)
- Improved UI, especially optimized for iPhone 6 & 6 plus users.
- Several new fonts!
- Added GifLab support for video to GIF conversion

- We've fixed an issue affecting some of you who purchased VidLab when it was paid. The features you paid for should now be unlocked free of charge.
- We've fixed bugs related to stickers.

- We've added a video fill option, allowing you to letterbox videos, for those of you who like to add text & captions this way.
- Other small bug fixes to improve performance of the app
- Follow along on Instagram @VidLabApp for inspiration, tips, and sneak peeks!

Added 3D touch to homescreen
Bug fixes

We have a really exciting update in the works! Unfortunately, this isn't it :(
We did however, fix some bugs, and improve the performance of the app.

New Artwork!

- Valentine's Day / Love Pack
- Hello, Spring!

We're working on awesome new features. Make sure to follow us on Instagram @VidLab for inspiration, sneak peeks, and more!
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements as we prepare for our major VidLab 2.0 launch - coming soon!

• v1.17 - Added new artwork!
• v1.16 - Minor bug fixes and performance improvements as we prepare for our major VidLab 2.0 launch - coming soon!

VidLab 2.0 is finally here! Your favorite video editor just got a whole lot better.

What's new in VidLab 2.0:

- Video collages
- Unlimited video length
- Improved timeline & clip editor
- Video transitions
- Enhanced video filters & effects
- Rebuilt rendering engine for ultra HD video export

VidLab 2.0 is finally here! Your favorite video editor just got a whole lot better.

What's new in VidLab 2.0:

- Video collages
- Unlimited video length
- Improved timeline & clip editor
- Video transitions
- Enhanced video filters & effects
- Rebuilt rendering engine for ultra HD video export

2.0.1
- Bug fixes and improvements

2.0.2
- Bug fixes and improvements (especially for iOS 9)

------
VidLab 2.0 is finally here! Your favorite video editor just got a whole lot better.

What's new in VidLab 2.0:

- Video collages
- Unlimited video length
- Improved timeline & clip editor
- Video transitions
- Enhanced video filters & effects
- Rebuilt rendering engine for ultra HD video export
Bug fixes
Bug fixes and improvements, particularly while saving
Slideshow fixes
Slideshow fixes

Hey guys! If you own an iPhone X - this app updates includes a fresh new UI for you! We've also made some performance improvements and fixed the following pesky little bugs:

- We've fixed applying Video FX causing the video preview to go blank
- We've fixed a bug where a green line was being added to certain saved videos
- We've fixed font and color panels not showing up sometimes
- We've fixed the bug causing the app to crash when you tried to add a video transition

Thank you! Join us on Instagram (@vidlab) and share the things you're making with #vidlab to be featured on our social galleries :)

This update introduces some improvements to the app, most notably:

- Slideshows are now saving correctly
- We have improved the voice recording quality
And other minor bug fixes!

Fixed text saving on wrong location bug
Fixed a bug that prevented saving videos
Other minor bug fixes and performance improvements
YouTube bug fixed

Exciting news - we have a massive update around the corner! We can't wait to show you VidLab 3.0. The app is being rebuilt from the ground up, and is absolutely beautiful.

In the meantime - we've fixed some bugs with this update, and made some preparations for our big 3.0 version coming soon.

Fixed adding music.
In the meantime - we've fixed some bugs with this update, and made some preparations for our big 3.0 version coming soon.
